QuestData.Title: The Initiate's Revenge
QuestData.Description: I... I'm finished. My spirit will be with the Raven Mother soon.$b$bI beg of you, stranger... avenge me! Slay these filthy beasts.
QuestData.RewardText:
The lives of all the flock are precious. I'm glad to know that his murderers have been brought to justice.
Thank you, $n, you have done us a great honor.
